original_text: “Therefore thus says the Lord God: Because you have made your guilt to be remembered, in that your transgressions are uncovered, so that in all your deeds your sins appear—because you have come to remembrance, you shall be taken in hand.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 너희의 악이 기억을 되살리며 너희의 허물이 드러나며 너희 모든 행위의 죄가 나타났도다 너희가 기억한 바 되었은즉 그 손에 잡히리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore thus says the Lord God:
Because you have made your guilt to be remembered,
in that your transgressions are uncovered,
so that in all your deeds your sins appear—
sentences.korean_translation: 네 모든 행위에 네 죄가 나타나므로—

sentences.original_text: because you have come to remembrance,
you shall be taken in hand.
